Agreement.serviceTerms: AightNow Service Terms of Use This agreement stipulates the terms of use of the service between Spacspace Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as 'the Company') and the user. By using the service, you are deemed to have agreed to these terms. This agreement stipulates the rights, obligations, and responsibilities between the Company and the user in connection with the provision of services by the Company. Article 1 Purpose This agreement aims to stipulate the rights, obligations, and responsibilities between the Company and the user regarding the use of the SpacAnalyst service, an AI analyst platform provided by Spacspace Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as 'the Service'). Article 2 Definition of Terms 'Service' refers to the SpacAnalyst service, an AI analyst platform provided by Spacspace Co., Ltd. 'User' refers to an individual who agrees to this agreement and uses the service provided by the Company. 'Member' refers to an individual who registers for the service and uses the service provided by the Company. 'Site' refers to the website operated by Spacspace Co., Ltd. to provide the service. Article 3 Effectiveness and Revision of the Agreement This agreement stipulates the rights and obligations between the user and the Company in using the service. This agreement takes effect when posted on the website operated by the Company. The Company may revise this agreement as necessary, and the revised terms will take effect immediately upon posting on the site. Article 4 Provision and Use of the Service The Company provides the user with the SpacAI Analyst service by combining real-time corporate announcement information and analysis of 40,000 daily news data. Membership registration is required to use the service. When registering, the information requested by the Company must be provided, and the provided information must always be accurate and up-to-date. The Company strives to protect the user's personal information, and the details are governed by the Privacy Policy. When using the service, the user must comply with the following: Do not illegally use other people's information and personal data. Do not violate laws, regulations, and terms of use when using the service. Do not compromise the security, reliability, and efficiency of the service. Do not defame or disadvantage others. The Company may restrict the use of the service for users who violate this agreement. Article 5 Changes and Interruption of the Service The Company may modify, change, or interrupt part or all of the service for quality improvement and operational needs. Changes and interruptions of the service will be notified in advance, and the Company is not responsible for any damages resulting from these changes. Article 6 Copyright and Intellectual Property All copyrights and intellectual property rights related to the services created by the Company belong to the Company. Without the prior consent of the Company, users may not process, sell, reproduce, or distribute information posted on the service. Article 7 Disclaimer The Company is not responsible for any damages that occur while using the service. The Company is exempted from liability for providing the service in case of force majeure, such as natural disasters, war, and service interruptions by telecommunications providers. Article 8 Resolution of Disputes For matters not stipulated in this agreement, they will be resolved according to relevant laws and the Company's internal regulations. Supplement This agreement takes effect from July 8, 2024. Users are requested to read this agreement carefully and use the service. By using the service, you are deemed to have agreed to this agreement. We will do our best to provide better services in the future.
Agreement.privacyPolicy: Privacy Policy SpacAI Analyst Privacy Policy Spacspace Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as 'the Company') considers the user's personal information important and complies with the Act on Promotion of Information and Communications Network Utilization and Information Protection. This Privacy Policy explains how the Company collects, uses, and protects the user's personal information. Items of Personal Information Collected and Methods of Collection Items of Personal Information Collected User's identification information (name, email address, etc.) Information generated during the service use process (log data, cookies, session information, etc.) Methods of Collection of Personal Information When the user voluntarily provides these during membership registration and service use Automatic collection during the service use process (e.g., cookies) Purpose of Collection and Use of Personal Information The Company uses the collected personal information for the following purposes: Service provision and operation Member management and identity verification, authentication, age confirmation during service provision Service improvement and new service development Providing personalized services suitable for users Retention and Use Period of Personal Information The Company destroys the collected and used personal information without delay after achieving the purpose of collection and use. However, the information may be retained according to relevant laws. Provision and Delegation of Personal Information The Company does not provide or delegate the user's personal information to third parties. However, exceptions are made when the user consents or if required by law. Destruction of Personal Information The collected and used personal information is destroyed without delay after achieving its purpose. The methods and period of destruction are carried out according to relevant laws. Measures to Ensure the Security of Personal Information The Company takes the following measures to protect the user's personal information securely: Encryption of personal information processing systems Installation and operation of various security systems to prevent hacking Education and supervision of personal information processing staff User's Rights and Obligations Users have the right to view, correct, delete, and suspend the processing of their personal information. Related requests can be submitted via the Company's customer center. Personal Information Protection Officer The Company has designated a Personal Information Protection Officer to oversee the processing of personal information and handle complaints and remedies related to user damage. Name: Yeo Min-ho Department: CEO Email: admin@ymsco.site Supplement This Privacy Policy takes effect from July 8, 2024. The Company will notify users of any changes to this Privacy Policy through an announcement.

MyPage.terms_of_use_content:
Terms of Service

SpacAI Analyst Terms of Service

These terms specify the rules for the use of the service between SpaceSpace Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "the Company") and the user.
By using the service, the user is deemed to have agreed to these terms.
These terms stipulate the rights, obligations, and responsibilities between the Company and the user in connection with the provision of services by the Company.

Article 1 - Purpose

These terms aim to specify the rights, obligations, and responsibilities between the Company and the user concerning the use of the AI Analyst platform SpacAI Analyst service (hereinafter referred to as "the Service") provided by SpaceSpace Co., Ltd.

Article 2 - Definition of Terms

"Service" refers to the AI Analyst platform SpacAI Analyst service provided by SpaceSpace Co., Ltd.
"User" refers to any person who agrees to these terms and uses the services provided by the Company.
"Member" refers to any person registered for the service and using the services provided by the Company.
"Site" refers to the website operated by SpaceSpace Co., Ltd. to provide the service.

Article 3 - Effect and Revision of Terms

These terms govern the rights and obligations between the user and the Company when using the service.
These terms take effect by being posted on the site operated by the Company.
The Company may revise these terms if necessary and will post the revised terms on the site with the effective date and changes.
The revised terms take effect immediately upon posting.

Article 4 - Provision and Use of the Service

The Company provides users with the SpacAI Analyst service, combining real-time corporate announcement information and daily analysis of 40,000 news data.
To use the service, registration as a member is required. When registering as a member, the user must provide the information requested by the Company, which must always be accurate and up-to-date.
The Company strives to protect users' personal information, and related matters are subject to the privacy policy.
When using the service, the user must comply with the following:

Do not illegally use others' information and personal information.
Do not violate laws, regulations, and terms of use when using the service.
Do not compromise the safety, reliability, and efficiency of the service.
Do not engage in acts that harm the reputation of others or cause disadvantages.
The Company may restrict the use of the service by users who violate these terms.

Article 5 - Changes and Suspension of the Service

The Company may modify, change, or suspend part or all of the service to improve service quality and for operational needs.
The Company will notify in advance of changes and suspensions of the service, and the Company assumes no responsibility for damages caused by these changes and suspensions.

Article 6 - Copyright and Intellectual Property Rights
All copyrights and intellectual property rights on the services created by the Company belong to the Company.
The user cannot process, sell, reproduce, or distribute the information posted in the service without the prior consent of the Company.

Article 7 - Disclaimer
The Company assumes no responsibility for any damage resulting from the user's use of the service.
The Company is exempt from responsibility for providing services in the event of force majeure such as natural disasters, wars, or service interruptions by telecommunication service providers.

Article 8 - Dispute Resolution
If issues not specified in these terms arise, they will be resolved in accordance with relevant laws and the Company's internal regulations.

Appendix

These terms take effect from July 8, 2024. Users should carefully read these terms and use the service. Using the service is deemed to have accepted these terms.
MyPage.privacy_policy_content:
Privacy Policy

SpacAI Analyst Privacy Policy
SpaceSpace Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "the Company") places great importance on users' personal information and complies with the Act on Promotion of Information and Communications Network Utilization and Information Protection, etc.

This privacy policy explains how the Company collects, uses, and protects users' personal information.
Categories of Personal Information Collected and Methods of Collection
Categories of Personal Information Collected
User identification information (name, email address, etc.)
Information generated during service use (log data, cookies, session information, etc.)
Methods of Collection of Personal Information
Information voluntarily provided by users when registering and using the service
Information automatically collected during service use (cookies, etc.)
Purposes of Collection and Use of Personal Information
The Company uses the collected personal information for the following purposes:

Provision and operation of the service
Management of members and identification, authentication, and age verification of users during service provision
Improvement of services and development of new services
Provision of customized services suitable for users
Retention and Use Period of Personal Information
The Company destroys the collected personal information immediately after achieving the purpose of collection and use. However, if retention is required by relevant laws, the information will be retained in accordance with those laws.

Provision and Delegation of Personal Information
The Company does not provide or delegate users' personal information to third parties. However, the information may be exceptionally provided in case of users' consent or legal requirements.
Destruction of Personal Information
Personal information is immediately destroyed after achieving the purpose of collection and use. Methods and periods of destruction comply with relevant laws.
Measures for Ensuring the Security of Personal Information
The Company takes the following measures to securely protect users' personal information:

Encryption of personal information processing systems
Installation and operation of various security systems to prevent hacking
Training and monitoring of employees responsible for processing personal information
Rights and Obligations of Users
Users have the right to access, correct, delete, and suspend the processing of their personal information. Related requests can be submitted through the Company's customer service center.
Personal Information Protection Officer
The Company is fully responsible for managing personal information and designates the following personal information protection officer to handle users' complaints and provide remedies.

Name: 염민호
Department: CEO
Email: admin@ymsco.site

Appendix

This privacy policy takes effect from July 8, 2024. The Company will notify users of any modifications to the privacy policy through announcements.

NotFound.not_found_title: The page you requested could not be found.
NotFound.not_found_content: We couldn't find the page you requested because the address of the page was entered incorrectly, or the address has been changed or deleted.

Stock.stock_report: Reflecting robust automobile demand despite sharp interest rate hikes, we raise Tesla's target price by 26% to $340 and maintain it as a Top Pick. Although a short-term pause is expected, the company's competitive edge is strengthening in the medium term. As traditional OEMs transition to electric vehicles more slowly and Chinese startups' cash flow weakens, Tesla's manufacturing competitiveness gap is expected to widen further once its Mexico plant becomes operational.
Stock.stock_desc: Apple designs, manufactures, and sells smartphones, personal computers, tablets, wearables, and accessories, and sells a variety of related services. Product categories include iPhone, Mac, iPad, Wearables, Home, and Accessories.

Chatbot.comment: Hello, this is the Aightnow chatbot. If you have any questions about foreign stocks, feel free to ask me!
